ProductEmissionsFactor.name: ProductEmissionsFactor
ProductEmissionsFactor.description: Represents information about the emissions factors used in quantifying the emissions by a product in the supply-chain.

EmssnFctrDataSource.description: The source of the emissions factor reference data and its description.

EmssnFctrDataSourceType.description: The type of data source of the emissions factor reference data.

EmssnFctrUpdateYear.description: The year in which this reference data for the emissions factor was most recently updated.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product emissions factor.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

Region.description: Specifies the region within the country associated with this emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

SupplierId.description: The supplier responsible for this product emissions factor.

TotalEmissionsValue.description: The total amount of carbon emissions for each unit of measure.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for this product emissions factor. For custom unit of measure, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_bundle, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the SustainabilityUom object}; for example, custom_bundle.
